item.description:
Please Update your RSVPs if you can no longer attend. There is a Waiting List. Event is now open to the public with a charge of $8.00 per RSVP per person for all red sox natives members, guests and non-members.  

Red Sox Native Lorna is hosting an After Work Pool Party at Jillian's from 6:00 - 8:00 pm on Friday, February 17 

Jillian's will provide lite appetizers and the use of 5 pool tables for 2 hours.

There will be a cash bar.

This event is only for members of the Red Sox Natives meetup. You must be a member of the Natives in order to RSVP and get your name on the list. No guests.

An age 21 plus event.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess upstairs when you arrive for Lorna and the Red Sox Natives Party
item.name: After Work Pool Party at Jillian's
